sentences.en: Grateful acknowledgment is made for permission to reprint.
sentences.cn: 为获准重印致以深切感谢。

sentences.en: He believes in that children should be grateful and accept the fact.
sentences.cn: 他主张孩子们应感谢并接受这一事实.

sentences.en: He closed his letter with expression of grateful thanks.
sentences.cn: 他在那封信的结尾表达了自己的感激之情.

sentences.en: He was grateful for a chance to relax and collect his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他很庆幸有机会放松放松，整理一下自己的思绪。

sentences.en: I am extremely grateful to all the teachers for their help.
sentences.cn: 我非常感谢所有老师的帮助。

sentences.en: I was grateful for the old man's sage advice.
sentences.cn: 我很感激那位老人贤明的忠告.

sentences.en: I will always feel grateful to that little guy.
sentences.cn: 我会永远感激那个小伙子。

sentences.en: I'm eternally grateful that we managed to go there before the war.
sentences.cn: 我们设法在战争爆发前到了那里,我对此永生感恩.

sentences.en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
sentences.cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对好的事心存感恩。

sentences.en: Meg flashed Cissie a grateful smile.
sentences.cn: 梅格冲茜茜感激地笑了一笑。

sentences.en: Our grateful thanks go to all who participated.
sentences.cn: 我们衷心感谢所有参与者。

sentences.en: She gave me a grateful look.
She would be grateful for their company on the drive back.
sentences.cn: 有他们做伴开车陪她回去，她会很感激的。

sentences.en: They were very grateful to be put right and thanked me profusely.
sentences.cn: 他们非常感谢我纠正了他们的错误，一再地向我道谢。

sentences.en: We are grateful to you for permission to reproduce this article.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢您允许我们复印这篇文章。

sentences.en: When Tom gave him the money, the panhandler was surprised and seemed grateful.
sentences.cn: 当汤姆给他钱时, 这名乞丐很惊奇而且好像很感激.

trans.tran_en: feeling that you want to thank someone because of something kind that they have done, or showing this feeling
